alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Washington (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 11 at 7:01PM CDT until July 11 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Washington County in southeastern Wisconsin... Central Dodge County in southeastern Wisconsin... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 700 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Beaver Dam, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Beaver Dam, Hartford, Slinger, Horicon, Juneau, Hustisford, Iron Ridge, Addison, Rubicon, Lebanon, Woodland, Neosho, Clyman, Lowell, Nenno, Holy Hill, Allenton, South Beaver Dam, Minnesota Junction and Monches. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
